name: Zombie Hunter (clementesepulveda)
description:
Your sanity is slowly going down thanks to all the zombies walking around, and the only way to stay alive is to kill them. Pick up the health kits to keep your sanity up and kill as many zombies as you can to raise your score. How long can you survive for?

Controls:

- WASD to move

-Shift to run

- Left mouse click to shoot

- Space to jump
